properties.title:
Aberchirder and District Men's Shed
Market Street, Aberchirder, Huntly Aberdeenshire AB54 7SW. A warm welcoming space providing teas, coffees, beverages, biscuits, we have books, jigsaws, games, various work shops people can get involved with or just see what we do, a polytunnel to cultivate and provide produce to the community and beyond, we are also applying for National Lottery funding to upgrade our kitchen to provide a soup kitchen to help through the winter months in partnership with Aberdeenshire Council. We also run knitting and crochet, photography and crafting groups, basic computer training up to SQA level 4 at the Men's Shed with CLD Community Learning & Development. Open 0900 to 1600 Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday's - however this is flexible depending on people's needs.

Portsoy Church Centre: 15 Seafield Street Portsoy AB45 2QL. Monday Morning 2-4 pm Soup/Snacks
Tuesday Morning 10-12 Coffee/Tea/ Snacks
Thursday afternoon 12-2pm Tea/Coffee/Snacks
Friday Morning 9.15 - 11.15 Tea/ Coffee/Snacks. Closed from Dec 16th 2023 - January 5th 2024.

Cosy Coffee: Macduff Parish Church Hall, Market Street, Macduff AB44 1LL. A friendly warm welcome from the Cosy Coffee team - senior pupils from Macduff Primary School and Macduff Parish Church volunteers. Tea, coffee, juice and biscuits are free. 2pm to 4:30pm
Every Monday afternoon in school term time. Details every week on Macduff Parish Church Facebook page: www.facebook.com/MacduffParishChurch

Winter Warmer Wednesdays: The Vinery, Airlie Gardens, Banff AB45 1AZ. Friendly warm enviornment, safe place, warm foods, soups/stews etc.
Refreshments, wi-fi, books/reading materials, games and good company. Wednesdays open until 7.30pm.
